creator: OPPO ColorOS
descriptionHtml:
Health data
Pairing with various smart wearable devices, the app keeps paying attention to your health by recording and visualizing your daily activities, heart rate, and sleep data, etc.
 
Workout record
The app provides a variety of workout modes, tracks your route, records daily steps, workout duration, distance, and calories burned, and generate personal exercise reports to help you fully understand your progress.
 
Smart devices
The app supports pairing and managing various smart devices such as smart watches and bands, including watch face management, message notifications and incoming call info synchronization.
descriptionShort: A health & fitness app that can pair and manage various smart devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improved the accuracy of daily steps
- Fixed bugs and improved user experience

Here at OPPO, user experience is always our No.1 priority. Please feel free to reach out to us at P_Health@oppo.com with your questions, suggestions, or ideas. We will be more than happy to answer your questions and your suggestions might even be included in our future updates. Thank you for your trust and support and we look forward to hearing from you!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added support for OPPO Band
- Bug fixes and user experience improvements

title: HeyTap Health

creator: ColorOS
descriptionHtml:
HeyTap Health is a personal fitness app that records and visualizes your workout and health statistics and allows you to manage your OPPO smart wearable devices.

[Workout and health statistics]
Get a better understanding of your workout and health data from OPPO Watch and OPPO Band.
- Tracks your SpO2 data (Only supported by OPPO Band)
- Tracks your sleep and evaluates your sleep quality
- All-day heart rate monitoring
- Tracks your daily activities and provides workout guidance

[Manage smart devices]
Pair your OPPO Watch or OPPPO Band with the app to explore more features.
- Receive notifications on your wearable devices
- Pick your favorite one from a collection of watch faces
- Choose your own style for the AI Outfit watch face (Only supported by OPPO Watch)
- Customize your personal workout and health settings

Feedback:
If you encounter any problems when using the app or have any suggestions, please send an email to P_Health@oppo.com
descriptionShort: A health & fitness app that can pair and manage OPPO smart wearable devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Google Fit supported: You can now sync your workout and health data to Google Fit.
2. Weather issue fixed for OPPO Watch.
3. Fixed an issue where the steps displayed on the Home page were inconsistent with the data in Daily Activity.
4. Optimized the sleep scoring logic.
5. Bug fixes and user experience improvements.

HeyTap Health is a personal fitness app that records and visualizes your workout and health statistics and allows you to manage your OPPO smart wearable devices.

[Workout and health statistics]
Get a better understanding of your workout and health data from OPPO Watch and OPPO Band.
- Tracks your SpO2 data (Only supported by OPPO Band)
- Tracks your sleep and evaluates your sleep quality
- All-day heart rate monitoring
- Tracks your daily activities and provides workout guidance

[Manage smart devices]
Pair your OPPO Watch or OPPPO Band with the app to explore more features.
- Receive notifications on your wearable devices
- Pick your favorite one from a collection of watch faces
- Choose your own style for the AI Outfit watch face (Only supported by OPPO Watch)
- Customize your personal workout and health settings

Feedback:
If you encounter any problems when using the app or have any suggestions, please send an email to P_Health@oppo.com
descriptionShort: A health & fitness app that can pair and manage OPPO smart wearable devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and user experience improvement.

title:
HeyTap Health
4.10.6_6842161_231023

creator: BRAVO UNICORN PTE. LTD.
descriptionHtml:
OHealth (formerly HeyTap Health) is the companion application for OPPO smart wearable devices. After pairing your device, you can set OHealth to access your phone's notifications, SMS and calls, and process or answer them on the device. In addition OHealth can records and visualizes your workout and health statistics generated by your device.

* Manage smart devices
Pair your OPPO Watch or OPPO Band with the app to explore more features.
- Receive notifications, SMS and calls on your wearable device
- Pick your favorite one from a collection of watch faces
- Design your own AI watch face (only supported by OPPO Watch)
- Customize workout and health settings for wearables

* Workout and health statistics
Get a better understanding of your workout and health data from OPPO Watch and OPPO Band.
- Tracks your SpO2 data (Note: The results are for reference only and do not constitute actual medical advice. Supported models: OPPO Band/OPPO Band2/OPPO Watch Free. )
- Tracks your sleep and evaluates your sleep quality
- All-day heart rate monitoring
- Tracks your daily activities and provides workout guidance

* Feedback
If you encounter any problems when using the app or have any suggestions, please send an email to OHealthApp@gmail.com
descriptionShort: A health & fitness app that can pair and manage OPPO smart wearable devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and user experience improvement.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Wear supported earphones to monitor cervical health data.
2. Support syncing fitness data to Strava.
There are many other experience optimizations and bug fixes, it is recommended to update to the latest version.

Improved the accuracy of other apps reading OHealth data from Health Connect.

1. Comprehensive upgrade of sports experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update:
Supports daily, weekly, monthly and annual trend analysis of steps and calorie consumption.
Supports the generation of videos to share exercise track records.

There are many other experience optimizations and bug fixes. It is recommended to use the updated version.

Recent updates:
1. Comprehensive upgrade of sports experience.
2. Support syncing fitness data to Strava.

- All-day heart rate monitoring
- Tracks your daily activities and provides workout guidance

* Feedback
If you encounter any problems when using the app or have any suggestions, please send an email to OHealth@HeyTap.com
descriptionShort: A health & fitness app that can pair OPPO and OnePlus smart wearable devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update:
1. Supports pairing with the recently launched OPPO Watch X2 and OnePlus Watch 3.
2. Optimized the experience of some functions and fixed some bugs.

Recent updates:
1. Support syncing fitness data to Strava.
2. Supports trend analysis of steps and calorie consumption.
3. Supports the generation of videos to share exercise track records.

descriptionShort: A health & fitness app that can pair OPPO and OnePlus smart wearable devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Added support for recording Cycle Tracker.
2. Optimized sleep algorithm.
3. The Migration Data is adapted to new data types, including Mind and Body, Wrist Temperature, etc.
4. Added Workout page in Fitness.
5. Optimized the UI issues of Run and Walk pages.
6. Added step data node display in the Health journey.
7 Support pairing with OnePlus Watch and OnePlus Band.
8. Some experience optimization and bug fixes.
